title: Low-Allergy Gluten-Free Flour Substitute Recipe
full_text:
Low-Allergy Gluten-Free Flour Substitute Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
15 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
500
grams
tapioca starch
500
grams
glutinous
rice flour
(sweet rice flour)
400
grams
arrowroot
300
grams
sorghum flour
100
grams
potato flour
Directions
Whisk together all the ingredients in a bowl. Store in airtight container at room temperature for up to 6 months.
Special Equipment
Digital scale
